insert into log (company_id, company_name, user_id, user_name, ip, terminal_type, log_type, operate_module, operate_type, operate_time, server_id, insert_time, operate_desc) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{logType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operateModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update log set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminal_type = #{terminalType,jdbcType=CHAR}, log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=CHAR}, operate_module = #{operateModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=CHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, server_id = #{serverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_desc = #{operateDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, company_id, company_name, user_id, user_name, ip, terminal_type, log_type, operate_module, operate_type, operate_time, server_id, insert_time, operate_desc from log where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
